components.name: Main Shell
components.description: Tapered case body with panel openings, magnet recesses, and integrated internal component mounts
features: Integrated SSD, Ethernet, and Pi5 mounts

components.name: Front Panel - Crystal Burst
components.description: Removable magnetic panel with radial diamond pattern inspired by crystal energy burst

components.name: Rear Panel - Fortress Gate
components.description: Removable magnetic panel with hex matrix and crystal slot ventilation pattern
features: Top crystal slot vents for exhaust

components.name: Left Panel - Shield Array
components.description: Removable magnetic panel with shield tessellation and Raspberry Pi port cutouts

components.name: Right Panel - Crystal Wave
components.description: Removable magnetic panel with sinusoidal wave pattern and cable management exits

components.name: SSD Clamp Mount
components.description: Snap-in rails for UGREEN M.2 SSD enclosure at base of case (z=3mm)

components.name: Ethernet Clamp Mount
components.description: U-cradle with retention clips for UGREEN USB-C Ethernet adapter at z=35mm
features: Retention clips for 62 x 25 x 15mm adapter

components.name: Raspberry Pi 5 Mount
components.description: 4 corner mounting posts with M2.5 screw holes for Raspberry Pi 5 at z=65mm
features: 4 corner posts matching Pi 5 hole pattern (85 x 56mm)
Board sits at z=73mm with 8mm standoff

components.name: Headband Spacer
components.description: Graduated wedge spacer that slides between the AirPods Max mesh canopy and steel frame to reduce clamping force. Continuously adjustable with graduation notches.
features: Two frame rail grooves (5mm wide, 2mm deep) for lateral retention
4 graduation notches at 16mm intervals (+2mm stretch each)
1mm chamfer on leading edge for easy insertion

components.name: Tripod Base
components.description: Organic tripod base with three curved legs radiating from central hub. Column socket in hub accepts ColumnLower. Inspired by furniture design - flowing curves, stable footprint.
features: 3 curved legs at 120Â° intervals radiating 70mm from center
Legs taper from 22mm wide at hub to 16mm at tips
Legs curve down 12mm from hub to tip for stability

components.name: Column Lower
components.description: Tapered outer sleeve that press-fits into TripodBase socket. Hollow interior accepts ColumnUpper for height adjustment. M3 setscrew holes at 4 positions lock height. Includes storage bracket for stretcher vice.
features: Tapered cylinder: 27.5mm base to 24mm top (85mm tall)
4 M3 setscrew holes at 15mm vertical spacing
Setscrews lock ColumnUpper at desired height
Storage bracket: Horizontal clip (35mm from base) holds stretcher vice when not in use

components.name: Column Upper
components.description: Tapered inner column with integrated organic cradle at top. Slides into ColumnLower for height adjustment. Cradle features arched top surface and concave headband channel. Integrated spacer hook at back.
features: Tapered cylinder: 20.9mm base to 18mm top (115mm tall)
Arched top surface (R85 convex) with R13 concave headband channel
Integrated spacer hook slot at cradle back (42mm tall, 4mm gap)
0.3mm per-side tolerance for smooth sliding in ColumnLower

components.name: Stretcher Rail
components.description: Organic stretcher vice body with U-channel, fixed ear cup pad, M6 bolt counterbore, and graduation marks. Larger, smoother pad shapes (R50 concave) distribute pressure evenly. Part of gradual headphone stretching tool.
features: 145 x 26 x 28mm solid body with U-channel (15mm wide, 18mm deep)
Fixed end: 58mm tall organic pad with rounded edges, R50 concave face
Bolt end: M6 counterbore (outside) + clearance hole
Graduation marks every 5mm on top edge for tracking spread

components.name: Stretcher Arm
components.description: Sliding jaw for stretcher vice with organic ear cup pad. Base slides in rail channel, captive M6 nut receives bolt drive. Rounded pad edges and R50 concave curve for gentle contact.
features: 22 x 14.4 x 17.5mm base block slides smoothly in channel
58mm tall organic pad with rounded edges, R50 concave face
Captive M6 nut pocket on +X face
M6 bolt clearance hole through base

components.name: Bolt Retainer
components.description: Threaded knob that screws onto M6 bolt end (past captive nut) to prevent bolt from backing out completely during stretcher operation. Faceted grip for easy hand-tightening. Tap M6 thread after printing.
features: 16 grip facets around circumference for easy hand-tightening
M6 x 12mm deep threaded hole (tap after printing)
Prevents bolt from unscrewing out of arm during operation
100% infill for strength and threading durability
